channel.title: Own shop command help [Pi]
channel.description:
Hey so on my source i got a option just like when u click the player to trade him but now it says View shop.. ive seen it before whit a ::myshop command.. me its a npc that u trade to put ur shop up but when u try to put a item up it Disconnects u.... if somebody has the command for the ::myshop could u give me it plz.?
[b]Error on Client cmd:[/b] [img]http://i1103.photobucket.com/albums/g472/ganter2/cds.jpg[/img]
